title: Fmr. Biden Advisor: Can't use Venezuela Playbook in Iran
description: Amos Hochstein, former Special Presidential Coordinator for Global Infrastructure and Energy Security, says Iran is not Venezuela and removing the supreme leader is not a simple option. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
